item.description:
So Saturday, Feb. 28th at Playwright = Mardi Gras Party
Get in free before 11 if you have beads on.

Here's the plan, we meet up at Blackbear around 10 to 10:15. Pregame there a little bit. Head over to the Mardi Gras party next door by 10:45 at the latest.

Enjoy ourselves and game the heck out of a drunken debauchery that is Mardi Gras.

Game on boys
item.how_to_find_us: We will have beads on, or call me or Sergey
item.name: Saturday Night Mardi Gras Party @ Playwright (meet at Black Bear)
